Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 7 for SLE 15 SP2)

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 7 for SLE 15 SP2)
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 5.3.18-24_37 fixes one issue.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2020-25668: Fixed a concurrency use-after-free in con_font_op (bsc#1178622).
Notes.Title: Details
